attributes.action: Save Golf Clubs Western Park & Humberstone Heights From Closure
attributes.additional_details: Leicester City Council propose to close the only 2 pay and play municipal golf courses in Leicester.  This impacts on all age groups and a very large proportion of the general public of Leicestershire.  Western Park GC also houses green belt and the great crested newt.  The people of Leicestershire call on the government stop this proposal.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Council to decide upon.  However, you may wish to involve your local MP?
